content: मुर्छ् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (मूर्छति, मूर्छित or मूर्तं; the word is written as मूर्छ् or मूर्च्छ्) {@--1@} To settle into a solid form, coagulate, congeal. {@--2@} To faint, swoon, faint away; lose consciousness, become senseless; पतत्युद्याति मूर्च्छत्यपि <ls>Gīt. 4</ls>; क्रीडानिर्जितविश्वमूर्च्छितजनाघातेन किं पौरुषं <ls>Gīt. 3</ls>; <ls>Bk. 15. 55.</ls> {@--3@} To grow, increase, become strong or powerful; मुमूर्च्छ सहजं तेजो हविषेव हविर्भुजः <ls>R. 10. 79</ls>; मुमूर्च्छ सख्यं रामस्य <ls n="R.">12. 57</ls>; मूर्च्छंत्यमी विकाराः प्रायेणैश्वर्यमत्तेषु <ls>Ś. 5. 18</ls>; <ls>Ki. 16. 8</ls>, <ls n="Ki. 16.">59.</ls> {@--4@} To gather strength, thicken, become dense, prevail; तमसां निशि मूर्च्छतां <ls>V. 3. 7.</ls> {@--5@} To take effect on; छाया न मूर्च्छति मलोपहतप्रसादे शुदे तु दर्पणतले सुलभावकाशा <ls>Ś. 7. 32</ls>; हर्म्येषु मूर्छंति न चंद्रपादाः <ls>R. 16. 18</ls> ‘are not reflected’ &c. ({%b%}) To prevail against, have power against; न पादपोन्मूलनशक्ति रंहः शिलोच्चये मूर्छति मारुतस्य <ls>R. 2. 34.</ls> {@--6@} To fill, pervade, penetrate, spread over; <ls>Ku. 6. 59</ls>; <ls>R. 6. 9.</ls> {@--7@} To be a match for. {@--8@} To be frequent. {@--9@} To cause to sound loudly. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (मूर्छयति-ते) {@--1@} To stupefy, cause to faint; म्लेच्छान्मूर्छयते <ls>Gīt. 1.</ls> {@--2@} To strengthen, increase. {@--3@} To excite, stir up. {@--4@} To cause to sound loudly, play on (as a musical instrument).
